question: Which country has unveiled a draft "Humans in space policy 2021"?
explanation:
The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) has recently unveiled the draft "Humans in space policy 2021".
The policy will be sent to the government for approval. The policy seeks to facilitate start-ups and the local industry to build technologies for its human space programme. ISRO has also set up a two-member team to study the technologies needed for the mission.
